domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @OliverDowden @theJeremyVine That wasn’t the rules though- it was, and I quote- ‘if you or your family has symptoms of coronavirus, self isolate for 14 days’ that’s why when my son had it, I was at home, alone, terrified I would get it next and not be able to look after him. It’s pathetic
